text: int main ( ) { int t , x , max ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int s , s1 , s2 , i , j ; for ( x = 0 ; x < t ; x ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & s ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < s ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } s1 = 0 ; s2 = 0 ; for ( i = s - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { s1 = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; s2 = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; if ( s1 > s2 ) a [ i ] [ j ] = s1 ; else a [ i ] [ j ] = s2 ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
